problem.markdown:
Which of the following are body segments trained in the conduct of a Power Jump? [x] hips [ ] chest [x] shoulders [ ] arms [x] back
[explanation] Hips, thighs, lower legs, back, trunk, and shoulders are the body segments trained in the conduct of a Power Jump. [explanation]
problem.p: Which of the following are body segments trained in the conduct of a Power Jump?

div.p: Hips, thighs, lower legs, back, trunk, and shoulders are the body segments trained in the conduct of a Power Jump.
